snippet.title: My Own Rhythm Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the adrenaline rush of BeatShooter, the revolutionary rhythm-based FPS game! Create, share, and play custom levels synced to your favorite music.

🎮 Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3106260/BeatShooter/
🌐 Official website: https://www.sparkphial.com/beatshooter.html


🎵 Create Your Own Rhythm:
Design custom levels synced to any YouTube track! Our innovative level editor lets you place obstacles, define enemy spawn patterns, and choreograph the entire gameplay experience to match every beat and drop of your chosen song.

Dynamic Gameplay:
- Shoot to the Beat: Time your shots with the music to maximize your score
- Dodge, Dash, Slam: Navigate through a constantly evolving arena that changes with the rhythm
- Keyframes: Experience game-changing events triggered by the music

Vibrant, Reactive World:
Watch as the environment pulses and transforms with the music. From color-shifting platforms to beat-responsive projectiles, every element in BeatShooter is alive with rhythm.


Ranking Mode:
Challenge friends or compete globally on our leaderboards. Show off your rhythmic shooting skills and claim your spot as the ultimate BeatShooter champion.

Customization:
Tailor your experience with adjustable music volume, SFX settings, and difficulty levels. Make BeatShooter your own personal rhythm-shooter paradise.

Join our vibrant community of music lovers and FPS enthusiasts. Whether you're a casual player looking for a unique gaming experience or a hardcore rhythmophile aiming for the top of the Leaderboards, BeatShooter has something for everyone.

Get ready to see, hear, and feel the beat like never before.


Follow us:
Discord Invite: discord.com/invite/KSg5CfYUnG

Credits to @SparkPSX for his song "Emergency"
Credits to @cumunism2909 for his pistol model and some of the trailer

 #beatshooter #BeatShooter  #RhythmFPS #IndieGame #MusicGames #UnityGame
